message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's an excellent investment for someone like you who appreciates top-notch value. For this opportunity, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $140. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations!
